sections.heading: insurance; premium; policy must state
sections.text: Every fire insurance policy must state on its face the amount of the premium.SourceLaws 1913, c. 154, § 113, p. 455;R.S.1913, § 3250;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. VIII, § 5, p. 635;C.S.1922, § 7849;C.S.1929, § 44-705;R.S.1943, § 44-606.

44-606.Fire insurance; premium; policy must state.

Every fire insurance policy must state on its face the amount of the premium.

SourceLaws 1913, c. 154, § 113, p. 455;R.S.1913, § 3250;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. VIII, § 5, p. 635;C.S.1922, § 7849;C.S.1929, § 44-705;R.S.1943, § 44-606.
